title: Introducing: mossy.
content:
Making an impact on Soundcloud is relatively rare nowadays.

Now when a new act drops their first few tracks, the Spotify streams tend to far outpace those on Soundcloud – hence my surprise at seeing ‘mysterious’ artist mossy. clocking up the best part of a 1/4million streams on SC yet barely breaking the 4 figure mark on Spotify. Anyway, I’ve no doubt that with the inevitable playlist support that will materialise at some stage, those numbers will begin to even out – especially with more tracks of the quality of (sit still) and warpaint. Slick, ambitious productions with a knack for embedding a killer hook at the centre of them, there is serious potential here. Check both out below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
